title: CreativeLIVE - Big Chocolate: Producing EDM with Ableton Live.mk
description:
Big Chocolate: Producing EDM with Ableton Live

Ableton Live is the industry-leading application for creating and performing Electronic Dance Music. Mastering its unique capabilities and workflow are the key to getting your get ideas out of you head and into your speakers-- and becoming a prolific, songwriting machine.

In this one-day course, DJ/producer Big Chocolate teaches you how to create EDM songs from start to finish using Ableton Live. It's not just a re-telling of the manual, it's a look behind the scenes at his own unique workflow: you'll learn how to get started with the program, how to write and combine sonic elements, his secrets to getting unstuck, and finally how to put it all together into a finished song. Whether you're new to Ableton Live or an experienced user, you'll take your creativity to new levels!
